abstract: As finishing touches are put on the most comprehensive rewriting of financial rules since the Depression, a 57-year-old former law professor is emerging as one of the most influential financial regulators in the United States. His name is Daniel K. Tarullo.

lead_paragraph: As finishing touches are put on the most comprehensive rewriting of financial rules since the Depression, a 57-year-old former law professor is emerging as one of the most influential financial regulators in the United States.

headline.main: Daniel K. Tarullo, a Star Regulator at the Fed
